stimulusHtml: The graph above best supports which of the following statements?
choicesHtml: The Industrial Revolution destroyed the standard of living of the working classes.
The ideas associated with the Renaissance and the Reformation encouraged the English to have large families.
During the eighteenth century, the English population suffered substantially from periodic famines.
The English population increased in the seventeenth century despite civil wars and revolution.
During the late eighteenth century, the English population grew faster than it had from 1450 to 1600.
